title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 6
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 6
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Griffon (GFF). Griffon Corp.'s shares are headed for their biggest one-day advance in five years in response to a takeover and potential asset sale. The maker of Clopay garage doors will expand its home-product business by buying storage-product maker Closet-Maid from Emerson Electric Co. for $260 million. Griffon said it was approached by prospective buyers of its Clopay Plastic Products unit, a maker of plastic films used in disposable diapers and other items, and is considering alternatives.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
